jobDescription: Working at Horizon Pharma is more than a job – it’s personal. We define success by a different set of numbers: the number of lives touched, the number of lives changed, the number of lives saved. We’re a team of agile, out-of-the-box thinkers who are inspired to do more because we know we’re a part of something bigger. We strive to build meaningful careers at a company whose values we share because when we live up to our potential, we help patients live up to theirs. The Director, Hub and Patient Services is responsible for all access and reimbursement services for patients enrolled at the Hub supporting Rheumatology. Working remotely from anywhere in the US, ideally from within the central region, this individual will lead and manage both the Hub and the Commercial Co-Pay assistance support programs, including all budgeting and contracting requirements. Additionally, the role entails the development and implementation of key service model initiatives and day to day operational management in order to maximize treatment access for patients and sustain growth objectives. Exceptional analytical and presentation skills are required.Responsibilities:Develop strategy and lead implementation to optimize access and reimbursement for patients considering or treated with KRYSTEXXADesign KPIs and levers for accountability that meet the needs of internal and external stakeholdersPartner with the managed care team to signal and address transactional and systemic payer challenges.
